item.title: MIUI V13.0.10.0.RLDCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 12X China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12X China

Codename: psyche

Version: V13.0.10.0.RLDCNXM | 11.0

Size: 5.9 GB

MD5: f5ba411b4c6fdd0f023dd7c044827311

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Smart refresh rate
[Control center]
Fix: Unexpected redirections from the Notification shade controls occurred
[Camera]
Optimization: Image quality
Improved overall stability of the Camera app
[Music]
Fix: Issues which caused lag in Mi Music
[Other]
Fix: Switching between frame rates in Anti-flicker mode led to display issues
Fix: Headphones weren't shown as disconnected after actual disconnection

Download: Here
